title: Agent Loop
description: Observe → Think (Reasoning) → Act (Tool Use) → Observe Result → Loop

advanced.code:
graph TB
    A[Task Input] --> B[Observe Environment]
    B --> C[LLM Reasoning]
    C --> D{Need Tool?}
    D -->|Yes| E[Select Tool]
    D -->|No| F[Direct Answer]
    E --> G[Execute Tool]
    G --> H[Observe Result]
    H --> C
    F --> I[Final Response]
